patthana16.79:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.79:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
